GOD.content: has Christianity alone made possible an authentic responsibility, responsibility as history, and as history of Europe? there’s no choice here btwn a logical deduction & reference to the revelatory event [not simply affirmed as believer]

OOG.content: Europe is the good example of historicity, incarnating in its purity the Telos of all historicity: universality, omnitemporality, infinite traditonality

FL.content: we adult white male Europeans, carnivorous and capable of sacrifice

SPOM.content: haunting marks the very existence of Europe

POOF.content: once again referring to the ‘infinite’ Christianization of Greek fraternity, while reminding us that Greek phília carries w/in it the injunction of its infinitization, Derrida will privilege Christianiziation for the role it played in the theological-political graft that constructed political discourse of modern Europe

OH.content: is Europe an example or exemplary?
we must not forget programs that do not forget us [re: Eurocentrism, anti-Eurocentrism]
responsibility for the other heading—European?

Europe: representation or figure of a universal idea; has confused its face, figure, w/ a point, a phallus; the idea of an advanced point of exemplarity is the idea of the European idea, eidos, archē, telos, the idea of beginning, commanding, cap, captain, towards an accomplished end
advanced point is at once beginning and end, divided as beginning and end (Heidegger on Ort as point of spear, and fromm, Frömmigkeit, from promos, what leads, l’avant-garde)
Europe gathers difference into itself, is difference w/ itself
horizon (ancient Greek) = limit; to see itself (Europe) on the horizon, is to see itself from its end, discourse of anamnesis—taste for finality (goût de fin), for death
double bind, injunction divides us > guardians of a European idea that cares for what is other than it, the other heading, the heading of the other
from Valéry, Europe name of that which leads subject to desiring maximum (capital, power)
Europe: paleonymic appellation
there is a crisis whenever the capital of infinity and universality finds itself in danger, when the eidos, limits, ends, confines, the finitude of Europe, emerges
Heidegger’s Entmachtung of spirit > destitution of Europe
double injunction of Europe: 1) cannot be dispersed (monopoly) 2) remote control [TV] (dispersion)

double bind of European cultural identity: 1) necessary not to reconstitute centralizing hegemony (the capital) 2) necessary not to cultivate minority differences for their sake, untranslatable idiolects (not to multiply borders, marges, marches)

Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself
advance oneself (name & also extend), risk, Europe as avant-garde of geography & history
Valéry: Mediterranean has been a veritable machine for making culture
for Husserl, the European philosopher committed to universal reason is functionary of mankind
the duty to respond to call of European memory, all other duties presuppose this one in silence [?]

this same duty dictates welcoming foreigners, cultivating virtue of critical idea, but also submitting critique to deconstructive genealogy that exceeds it w/out compromising it, dictates a democracy to come (not even a regulative Kantian idea), tolerance of faith, minorities
duty to act in accord w/ a double contradiction that is not simply a Kantian illusionary antimony but an effective one (w/ experience, through experiment), interminable
for Valéry, capital belongs to series of Europe’s phenomenal manifestations

FWT.content: Europe arms itself and those against it w/ weapons against it—auto-immunization

the universal of philosophy (neither relativism nor nationalism) not a given, an essence, but an infinite process of universalization > in the name of European filiation we are liberating ourselves from Eurocentrism/ethnocentrism
Europe exports: 1) norms, advancements, language [re: consolidation of rights, laws, to sovereignty of subject] 2) its auto-hetero-deconstructive capacity or auto-immunity
Europe is the most beautiful example of auto-immunity, and allegory, because w/ Europe we see auto-immunity as survival, invincibility as auto-immunity: immense tragedy of a beautiful suicide

Gii.content: profound link btwn Europocentric universalism, humanism & nationalism

TN.content: question of touch belongs to history of body, to “my body” (hoc est emin corpus meum), to history of Europe having it out w/ its “Christianity”

OG.content: for Rousseau, only Europe can be itself & everything else at same time [re: language/society], pedagogical success & ethnological humanism have good fortune to appear in Europe
Derrida says Rousseau simply wrong for not using this universal opening en fait
